Song.title: Be Praised In All The Earth
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Mark Altrogge Â© 2002 Sovereign Grace Praise
Song.amazon_links: [{"asin":"B0010VIVW2","title":"Be Praised in All the Earth","artist":"Sovereign Grace Music","image_url":"http:\/\/ecx.images-amazon.com\/images\/I\/519CuW9nbdL._SL75_.jpg"}]

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [||: Em D | Cmaj7 D6 | Em D6 | Cmaj7 :||]
Verse 1: [Em]You are the [Bm/D]One who spoke{,} and [Cmaj7]worlds be[G]came [Em]You are our [Bm/D]maker and sus[Cmaj7]tainer [Em]And Jesus, [Bm/D]You alone are [Cmaj7]King of [G]Kings The [Am7]Christ of God, our [B]Savior And our on[Cmaj7]ly hope, our [Bsus4]only [B]love
Chorus: And we [E]want to see Your name Be [Cmaj7]praised in all the [D2]Earth O [Am]God of endless [G/B]glory,{,} G[C]od of endless [D] worth And we [E]want to see Your name Be [Cmaj7]praised in all the [D2]Earth For [Am]You alone have [G/B]conquered [C]You alone are [D]worthy of p[E]raise [C]You alone are [D]worthy of p[E]raise [| 2/4 C | 4/4 D |]
Verse 2: [Em]You are the [Bm/D]One{,} who fills our [Cmaj7]hearts with [G]joy [Em]You are our [Bm/D]light and our salv[Cmaj7]ation [Em]You are our [Bm/D]fullness, You are [Cmaj7]all we n[G]eed The [Am7]first and last, our [B]ransom And our right[Cmaj7]eousness, our [Bsus4]only l[B]ove
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 you are the one who spoke and worlds became you are our maker and sustainer and jesus you alone are king of kings the christ of god our savior and our only hope our only love chorus and we want to see your name be praised in all the earth o god of endless glory god of endless worth and we want to see your name be praised in all the earth for you alone have conquered you alone are worthy of praise you alone are worthy of praise verse 2 you are the one who fills our hearts with joy you are our light and our salvation you are our fullness you are all we need the first and last our ransom and our righteousness our only love
